featured.text: Wang Chien-ming, the Yankees’ best pitcher last year, already showed his great _____ for baseball when he was still a teenager.

definition.zh_def: 投手；壺，通常用來盛水或其他液體的容器。
definition.en_def: A person who throws the ball to the batter in baseball; a container with a spout used for pouring liquids.
definition.example: The pitcher threw a fastball that struck out the batter.
